alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron; Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN IRON, SOUTHEASTERN ASHLAND AND NORTH CENTRAL PRICE COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Butternut, to near Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Falls, Turtle Flambeau Flowage, Fifield, Butternut, Glidden, and Butternut Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
